english.segment1: Your Head Spins. Youre just happy to be here. What you miss is what you find
english.segment2: What you find is here. Just glide, no glance. Make the street and lights will
english.segment3: You can run across the sky. You can bring the night, to life, to life
english.segment4: Come with me. Its time for us to move our feet. Get this moving. Make this night what it should be. What you miss is what you find
english.segment5: Sidewalk are our canvas, so well, Do what we do what we do
